# 1


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.2     ✔ readr     2.1.4

ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
bike <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IAA-Faculty/statistical_foundations/master/bike.csv")

set.seed(123)
bike <- bike %>% mutate(id = row_number())
train <- bike %>% sample_frac(0.7)
test <- anti_join(bike, train, by = "id")
dim(train)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 12165    17
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
dim(test)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 5214   17
```
:::
:::


# 2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_lm <- lm(cnt ~ temp + hum + windspeed, train)
summary(bike_lm)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = cnt ~ temp + hum + windspeed, data = train)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-327.84 -102.59  -32.51   65.79  707.92 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  172.430      7.443  23.166   <2e-16 ***
temp         365.042      7.458  48.946   <2e-16 ***
hum         -268.340      7.776 -34.508   <2e-16 ***
windspeed     22.749     12.208   1.863   0.0624 .  
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 157.5 on 12161 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.2489,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.2487 
F-statistic:  1343 on 3 and 12161 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::


-   $R_a^2 is 0.2487$
-   The variables `temp`, `hum` are significant at the 0.01 level

# 3


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bike_lm2 <- lm(cnt ~ atemp + hum + windspeed, train)
summary(bike_lm2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = cnt ~ atemp + hum + windspeed, data = train)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-349.42 -102.16  -32.60   65.91  702.10 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  155.087      7.631  20.323  < 2e-16 ***
atemp        411.554      8.365  49.198  < 2e-16 ***
hum         -270.493      7.766 -34.831  < 2e-16 ***
windspeed     45.606     12.225   3.731 0.000192 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 157.4 on 12161 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.2502,	Adjusted R-squared:   0.25 
F-statistic:  1352 on 3 and 12161 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::


-   $R_a^2$ is 0.25
-   `atemp`, `hum`, and `windspeed` are all significant at the 0.01 level

# 4

Our second model with `atemp` has a higher $R_a^2$ value.
